item.title: Google Reader shuts off tomorrow, use Google Takeout and Reader is Dead to backup
item.description: Tomorrow Google Reader shuts off, have you grabbed your data? The easiest way to backup your subscriptions from Google Reader is to use Google Takeout. This will give you a .zip file with a lot of data, including a subscriptions.xml which you can import into any RSS reader that â€¦
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins
